results.title: Lathosterolosis: a disorder of cholesterol biosynthesis resembling smith-lemli-opitz syndrome.
results.text_hl: However, additional @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ are needed for better delineation of the clinical spectrum, genotype-phenotype correlation, and potential efficacy of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ treatment in this rare disorder.
